tutorial: 4. Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: We are in the Current > Position section of the Trading Engine and, to your left, the Entry Target Rate node!

paragraphs.text: Copy the node path from the menu!

Now, let's add 3% to the node's value:

tradingEngine.current.
position.entryTargetRate.value * 1.03
Go ahead and use the above for the Phase #1 stop loss formula! Remember I introduced a break in the line that you must remove!
